title: Travel through the Underdark
content:
ravel through the Underdark Objectives

Travel through the Temple of Sel没ne.

Halsin told us that there is a way to Moonrise Towers that leads through the Underdark. Tunnels beneath the temple of Sel没ne will lead us there. We learned that the best way to get to Moonrise Towers is through the Underdark. Tunnels beneath the temple of Sel没ne will lead us there.

Find the secret entrance to the Underdark.

We found the old temple of Sel没ne. The entrance to the Underdark must be here somewhere.
